title: My pixel 3 XL does not support E sim, what can I d0?
content:
there is no Esim setting on my pixel 3 xl even I try to use Google Fi on my pixel 3 xl, it said" To continue setting up, make sure your Google Fi sim card is inserted correctly" also, I tried to contact Google FI support and they said my phone does not support E-sim, I wanna know what can I do with such an E-sim malfunctioning phone? is that Google lying that they said pixel 3 xl support eSim?

MY pixel 3 xl: G013C
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
